answer: Make hay while the sun shines

hints.en: Take advantage of good opportunities while they last.
hints.sn: Ita chinhu kana nguva iri yakanaka.
hints.es: Haz heno mientras brilla el sol.

answer: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

hints.en: What you already have is more valuable than what you hope to get.
hints.tr: Eldeki bir kuş, çalıdaki iki kuştan iyidir.
hints.es: Más vale pájaro en mano que ciento volando.
Deja que los perros dormidos descansen.

answer: Let the cat out of the bag
Don't count your chickens before they hatch

hints.en: Don't make plans based on assumptions.
hints.es: No cuentes los pollos antes de nacer.

answer: Take it with a grain of salt
People who live in glass houses shouldn't throw stones

hints.en: Don't criticize others if you have similar faults.
hints.es: Quien tiene techo de vidrio no debe tirar piedras.

hints.en: An obvious problem that people avoid discussing.
hints.tr: Herkesin bildiği ama kimsenin konuşmadığı sorun.

answer: The early bird catches the worm

hints.en: Success comes to those who prepare early.
hints.es: Al que madruga, Dios lo ayuda.
